PokerPlayerMod:AcePower.NAME: Ace

PokerPlayerMod:SplitterPower.NAME: Splitter

PokerPlayerMod:FakeSymbolsPower.NAME: Fake Symbols

PokerPlayerMod:GamblerFormPower.NAME: Gambler Form

PokerPlayerMod:CardPrinterPower.NAME: Card Printer

PokerPlayerMod:StackedDeckPower.NAME: Stacked Deck
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, Look at the top #b
